The remote is bluetooth paired and it works from anywhere as long as it is connected. TV installation was done by jeeves and the service engineer was well educated about the TV and installation was done very quickly and perfectly. He aslo gave a demo about the TV features and showed every thing he could. Overall I am happy with the TV, flikart's delivery, packaging and installation. I hope the TV will keep working good and also hoping for motorola's support in case of any issues.

Operating System: The TV got about 1GB download at the time of installation to upgrade itself to the latest Android 10. Android 10 brings with itself a lot of benefits like dark mode, an efficient operating system, etc. Hope, Motorola provides continuous updates and upgrades.
